symc.name: CALLBACK_EVENT
symc.desc: The dwCallback parameter is an event handle.

symc.name: CALLBACK_FUNCTION
symc.desc: The dwCallback parameter is a callback procedure address.

symc.name: CALLBACK_NULL
symc.desc: No callback mechanism. This is the default setting.

symc.name: CALLBACK_THREAD
symc.desc: The dwCallback parameter is a thread identifier.

symc.name: CALLBACK_WINDOW
symc.desc: The dwCallback parameter is a window handle.

symc.name: WAVE_MAPPED_DEFAULT_COMMUNICATION_DEVICE
symc.desc: If this flag is specified and the uDeviceID parameter is WAVE_MAPPER, the function opens the default communication device. This flag applies only when uDeviceID equals WAVE_MAPPER. Note Requires Windows 7

symc.name: WAVE_FORMAT_DIRECT
symc.desc: If this flag is specified, the ACM driver does not perform conversions on the audio data.

symc.name: WAVE_FORMAT_QUERY
symc.desc: The function queries the device to determine whether it supports the given format, but it does not open the device.

symc.name: WAVE_MAPPED
symc.desc: The uDeviceID parameter specifies a waveform-audio device to be mapped to by the wave mapper.
